1.7.81.title: YesAuthority - 1.15.15

1.7.81.author: Vinod Raut

1.6.76.title: YesAuthority - 1.14.10
1.6.76.message: Added 9 chained methods these are viaRole, only, except, upto, getZones, getRoutes, withDetails, onlyDenied, onlyAllowed. availableRoutes and availableZones has been deprecated its recommended that you use getRoutes & getZones instead, also last versions options capability for details etc has been removed.
1.6.76.author: Vinod Raut
